text: Muminagana yena an'ya muminake chere kena kapherake bandhurupe grahana na kare. Yara erupa karabe allahara sathe tadera kena samparka thakabe na. Tabe yadi tomara tadera paksa theke kona anistera asanka kara, tabe tadera sathe sabadhanatara sathe thakabe allaha taâ€™ala tamra samparke tomadera satarka karechena. Ebam saba'i ke tamra kache phire yete habe.
